name: transformed
content:
transformed adjective
(PEOPLE/PLACES/THINGS)
Add to word list
Add to word list
having been changed in an important way: Soldiers came home to a transformed country. After the break, the team came out looking totally transformed.
More examplesFewer examplesPeter is a transformed man since he discovered cycling.The region most dramatically transformed is the South.The New Year's Eve party was a double celebration of their transformed home and the dawn of the new year.

transformed adjective
(INFORMATION)
science
  specialized (of information) having been arranged or presented in a particular way: The same results were obtained when we excluded children with missing data and retained the raw instead of transformed scores. All statistical comparisons have been made on logarithmically transformed data.
